text: (o pravakta!) Varu ninnu mare candruni (rupalanu) gurinci adugutunnaru. Nivu varito ila anu: "Avi prajalaku kalaganananu mariyu hajj dinalanu teliyajestayi." Miru mi illaloki vati venuka bhagam nundi pravesincadam rjuvartana (birr) kadu, daivabhiti kaligi undatame rjuvartana (birr). Kanuka miru indlalo vati dvarala nundiye pravesincandi. Mariyu miru saphalyam pondataniki allah yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi
